commands.description: Lists all events that are active on the server.
Lists the current cooldowns for the specified event. Leave blank to list all events.
Controls the current cooldown multiplier for the specified event. Lower is faster. Leave blank to list all multipliers for all events on the server.
Lists the remaining time left on a certain event. Leave blank for the remaining time on all events.

events.description: A plane flies over the map and drops a crate of supplies that players can loot. Players can see the crate on the map.
A helicopter manned by scientists patrols a monument and drops a locked crate there. Players can loot the crate, but it will take some time to unlock.
A cargo ship passes by the island. Players can find loot on it, protected by hostile scientists.
A helicopter patrols a section of the map, hostile to players and will attack on sight. Destroying it yields loot.
